text: Ashley Jensen (born 11 August 1969) is a Scottish actress and narrator. She was nominated for an Emmy for her role on the television series Extras, in which she appeared from 2005 to 2007. She was a cast member of the ABC series Ugly Betty. She also plays the main character in the comedy-drama detective television series Agatha Raisin. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish movie actors Category:Scottish television actors Category:Scottish voice actors Category:Scottish stage actors Category:People from Dumfries and Galloway
title: Ashley Jensen
